title: Short occupational exposure to glyphosate and its biomonitoring via urinary levels of glyphosate and metabolite AMPA (Amino-MethylPhosphonic acid), in Italian vineyard workers
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Stefano Porru, Melissa Ferrian, Giuseppe Mastrangelo, Diego Capovilla, Emanuela Corsini, Silvia Fustinoni, Manuela Peruzzi, Claudio Colosio
